short_summary: Request for Proposal for Agriculture and Agri-Food Canada
description: Provision of Research, Photography Services, and Digital Photography for the Agriculture and Agri-Food sector
full_summary:
# Agricultural Lifestyle Photography Services

**Notice Title:**
Agricultural Lifestyle Photography Services (Request for Proposal)

**Reference Number:** PW-23-01025259
**Amendment Number:** 1
**Solicitation Number:** 01B68-22-0201

**Publication and Tender Closing Dates:**

* **Publication Date:** February 9, 2023
* **Tender Closing Date:** March 21, 2023 at 2:00 PM GST

** overridden from Contracting Entity / Agency:**
Agriculture and Agri-Food Canada
1341 Baseline Road, Ottawa, Ontario, K1A0C5, Canada

**Contact Information:**
Kyle Harrington
kyle.harrington@agr.gc.ca

**Trade Agreements:**
The procurement is subject to the Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA) and the following trade agreements:

* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
* Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
* Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)

** Regions and Delivery Information:**
The contract is expected to be carried out in Canada.

**Scope of Work and Solicitation Overview:**
The procurement requires a contractor to provide agricultural lifestyle photography services, including research, artistic direction, and high-resolution digital color photographs, to capture and showcase various aspects of the agriculture and agri-food sector in Canada. The resulting photographs will be used to communicate the sector's adaptability and diversity, showcasing modern farming operations, consumers, science research, transport and economic themes, and sustainable solutions.

**Budget and Timeline:**
The contract will run from contract award to March 31, 2024, with two option years at the discretion of Agriculture and Agri-Food Canada.

**Additional Information:**
Please note that this procurement is subject to the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA) and the Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA). As per the solicitation documentation, all suppliers are encouraged to participate in the procurement process.

Please refer to the attached documents for more information and to submit your proposal:

* [PDF] Agricultural Lifestyle Photography Services Contract Specification - English
* [PDF] Agricultural Lifestyle Photography Services Contract Specification - French
* [PDF] DWCQA Series 1 - English
* [PDF] DWCQA Series 1 - French
* [PDF] Agricultural Lifestyle Photography Services Request
